function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Barriers to preventing threats to critical infrastructure","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vague definition of critical infrastructure","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid shifts in the definition of critical infrastructure","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of specific measures or laws regarding identification and protection of critical infrastructure","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in understanding the notion of critical infrastructure in European Union countries","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited protection to facilities or objects without considering dependencies or interdependencies","category":"Organization","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Deficiencies in protection of critical infrastructure","category":"Organization","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of precise knowledge about upcoming pandemics and their spreading behavior","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient emphasis on social and health aspects in building sustainability rating methods","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of preparation for future disease outbreaks","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of attention to environmental aspects of personal protective equipment disposal","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to clean drinkable water","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of water and wastewater with the virus","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative psychological effects of quarantine on mental health","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased greenery in urban environments","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of virus transmission via sewage due to human feces contamination in wastewater","category":"Environment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in housing layout and design leading to potential lack of privacy and overcrowding","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Selection of indoor finishing materials impacting virus lifetimes on surfaces","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Strain on health systems during unexpected situations like pandemics","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to visit hospitals or healthcare facilities due to lockdowns","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited involvement of architects and urban planners in response to pandemics","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited focus on the social pillar in sustainability assessment rating systems","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal priority given to key sustainability categories in rating systems","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial risks in oecd countries due to living costs","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited internet access for households in the commonwealth of independent states cis","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic fallout leading to increased poverty and malnutrition in central asian countries","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variability of home quarantine experience based on home conditions","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased water consumption and lack of sustainable water use during pandemics","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased household energy consumption due to remote work and decline.","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased consumption of resources in homes during extended lockdowns, leading to environmental impacts and resource strain.","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of self-sufficiency for extended periods of isolation","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased domestic violence due to lockdowns","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personal space and outdoor space complicating occupants’ lives and leading to health problems, including mental health.","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sudden drop in economic activity during lockdowns making it difficult for several population classes to pay for increasing housing costs.","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Isolation of residential complexes due to infected inhabitants, leading to the spread of infections among on residential building design","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Social distancing within the house","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High density of people in buildings leading to elevated risk of prolonged self-isolation and mental health issues","category":"Organization","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased urbanization despite the advice to expand horizontally and decrease densities may lead to higher risk of disease spread in crowded areas.","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on walkable and cyclable urban environments may lead to continued reliance on cars, increasing pollution and health risks.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate planning for emergency facility requirements and medical infrastructure may result in insufficient response to future outbreaks.","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on
